title: Cant buy RP in League of Legends with my PayPal
body:
When im trying to purchase RP on  the game League of Legends through paypal I keep recieve a message stating:
 
** "We're sorry, but we can't send your payment right now,
Return to merchant and try a different payment method"**
 
I tried closing the game and re-opening it and each time the same message pops up when I pay now.
I tried confirming my phone number, but nothing changes when I again click pay now. 
I know that I am using the same currency as the merchant.
I dont know what to do from here!
 
 Any help would be great (thank you in advance to anyone who replies).

replies.body: It sounds like the client might not have been able to get a clear connection to the Paypal servers in order to make that payment. I'd first do a quick check up on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) just in case something went a little wonky in there, but also double check your Paypal info again to make sure everything is setup correctly.
